name: Moon Ceti
overview: The title screen says this game was originally being made for Bubble Bus, which seems like either a big stretch or that Bubble Bus probably made the right move passing on this SEUCK created shooter. This is a vertically scrolling shooter with only forward offensive shooting capabilities. It does have bosses and multiple types of foes, decent graphics for the platform and nice backgrounds. It was published in Italy in the Alga Soft 1988 n.13b compilation.
